title: League of Legends keeps BSoDing/crashing/freezing (IT technician here)
body:
Hi guys. Before I even start, I want to tell you that I am very familiar with informatics and electronics, so therefore I tried lots of things before I thought about asking for your time. So the situation is like this: I had to upgrade my BIOS driver (from the official acer site, firstly defining my laptop model on their site), dunno which was the previous version, but it upgraded itself to 1.32. Now when I am playing league, or even just logging in/selecting a champion the game freezes, strange colours start to appear, like a rainbow of pixels on my client, then my laptop freezes entirely, often ending in BSoD. Now, my laptop specifications:

Laptop Model: Acer Aspire E5-571G-52VR
OS: Win10
Graphics: Intel HD Graphics + nVidia GeForce 840M
RAM: 16GB
I guess my processor is irrelevant

Now, the steps I made: 
- Uninstalled (with DDU) and installed again the nVidia graphics driver (there is even one, which came out today, tested it already)
- Reinstalled LoL many times
- Reinstalled Windows (keeping the files) + checked for both not updated and updated nVidia grahpics driver + checked for both old and new LoL installation
- Reinstalled Windows (removing all the files) and again checked for both possible ways for driver/lol
- I did return to default BIOS settings (v1.32 stayed the same)
- Did dozens of restarts, plug-out/ins

I guess I explained my situation. So guys, did you have issues like this? If so or not, do you know a way, to make this work?

Thanks in advance, Jan Pisior II

replies.body: I know that you've done a lot of troubleshooting, and my first impression is that there might be a driver or hardware problem.  There are other possibilities that I don't see mentioned yet, which are third party programs.  If you have any running like play.tv, remove them as they've been known to cause issues.  Otherwise, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can help.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to gather some logs, and attach it to the ticket for context.  We'll respond back asap!
